caption: Several men are inside a car, which stops in an open area. A group of people meets here. Soon, many more cars arrive, carrying individuals armed with guns. They surround the previous car. In an room, a few people engage in a conversation. Someone lies on a bed smoking, accompanied by an attractive woman. It's late at night, and some people are chatting in a room, dining in a restaurant, drinking on the road, and observing a fish tank. Some have their mouths covered, and one woman sets another person on fire. One woman suffocates a man by placing a plastic bag over his head, murdering him.
